name: SoilSense Pro
short_description: A handheld device that instantly analyzes soil composition, pH levels, moisture content, and nutrient deficiencies by inserting a probe into the ground. Results are displayed on an attached screen and synced to a mobile app for tracking field health over time.
pain_point: Farmers often don't know the exact nutrient levels in their soil, leading to over or under application of fertilizers
opportunity: Precise soil analysis can optimize fertilizer use, saving costs and improving yields
target_users: Small to medium-scale farmers, organic growers, and agricultural consultants
key_features: pH level detection with lime/sulfur recommendations
Moisture depth analysis up to 12 inches
Historical data tracking and trend analysis
Fertilizer recommendation engine based on crop type
technical_approach: Simulated sensor readings with crop-specific optimization algorithms
